full_summary:
# ITT - Wharf Reconstruction DFO-SCH Carter’s Point Harbour Facility

## Notice Details

* **Reference Number**: WS4162713829-Doc4246916348
* **Amendment Number**: 2
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4162713829
* **Publication Date**: October 11, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: October 26, 2023, 2:00 PM
* **Amendment Date**: October 18, 2023
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: October 22, 2023
* **Tender Status**: Expired

## Procurement Details

* **Procurement Category**: CNST (Constrution)
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Selective Tendering
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Region of Opportunity**: Nova Scotia

## Contracting Entity Details

* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contracting Entity Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC, K1A 0S5, Canada

## Tender Description

Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) is seeking proposals for the reconstruction of the wharf at the DFO-SCH Carter’s Point Harbour Facility, Halifax County, NS. The project involves the encapsulation of the existing wharf structure with a berlin wall system, including the supply and installation of steel support piles, concrete panels, concrete deck, wheel guard and seawall, ladders, mooring cleats, electrical system upgrades, a new launching ramp and expansion to the existing service area. The project must be completed by March 30, 2025.

To view the full tender notice and obtain additional information, please visit the following URL: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17693571?extsite=MTc2OTM1NzFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

## Contact Information

* **Contact Person**: Castillo Nieto, Carlos
* **Contact Email**: carlos.castillonieto@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Job Title**: (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Contact Title**: (he/him/his)
